<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81480</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81480</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>1188</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Business Legislation (H)</string>
            <string language="es">Legislación para empresas (Nivel superior, H, higher level)</string>
            <string language="ga">Reachtaíocht Ghnó (A)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Gesetzgebung (H)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Législation d'Affaires (h)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Legislação Do Negócio (h)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legislazione Di Affari (H)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακή νομοθεσία (H)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This quiz examines the various pieces of legislation on the Consumer and Industrial Relations.</string>
            <string language="es">El cuestionario examina varias partes de legislación sobre el Consumidor y las relaciones industriales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Scrúdaíonn an tráth na gceist seo píosaí éagsúla reachtaíochta ar an Tomhaltóir agus Caidrimh Thionsclaíoch.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Quiz überprüft die verschiedenen Stücke 
von Gesetzgebung auf dem Verbraucher und den industriellen Beziehungen
zwischen den Sozialpartnern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce jeu examine les divers textes de loi sur le 
consommateur et les relations industrielles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este quiz examina as várias partes de 
legislação no consumidor e nas relações industriais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo quiz esamina le varie parti di legislazione
sul consumatore e sulle relazione industriali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο διαγωνισμός γνώσεων εξετάζει τα διάφορα 
κομμάτια της νομοθεσίας για τον καταναλωτή και τις εργασιακές 
σχέσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>1188</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          </context>
          <language>en</language>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Scoilnet;
FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>
              <id>168</id>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
